9 Hours Daily is Mandatory for everyone in the Company.

 Wifi static for Attendance: 
 Basement- CA Basement Airtel 
 Ground Floor - CA GF 
 First Floor - Neo 
 Second Floor- Morpheous 

 Saturday is half-day (those who completed training period) means 5hr is mandatory. 

 If both punch-in and out is missed it will be considered as 1 day Leave. 
 If punch out is missed it will considered as half-day.

 Warning notification through attendance portal will be issued to everyone having low attendance, less working hours and number of leaves.

 It is mandatory to apply leaves through attendance portal ,if the leaves are not Approved by Team lead within the time frame the team member is not allowed to take leaves. It is mandatory to take leave only after approval by TL and HR .Leaves taken without TL and HR approval will be considered unplanned and strict actions will be taken.

 If anyone working on SUNDAY any team party trip, need to drop formal mail within 1 week (itâ€™s Mandatory) for getting approval from Team Lead and HR,otherwise it will not be considered. Informing through skype or verbal communication will not be considered.

 No attendance bonus.

Yearly Leaves = 2.5*12=30 + National Regional Holidays 9.

 An employee can take2.5 leaves in a month.

 Planned Leaves - Need to apply 2 days prior ,but for long holidays need to apply at-least 1 week before.
 Unplanned Leave - Which is applied on the same day or the day before.

 In case of unplanned leave due to health issues ,employee needs to submit the required and relevant documents to Team Leads/ Reporting Manager/ HR for approval.

 Monthly Deduction : Deduction on the grounds of more than 1 Unplanned leave.
 Quarterly Deduction : Deduction on the grounds of exceeding 7.5 leaves. Deduction of 3 consecutive months will be done on the 4 month.
 (Ex-deduction of 1st quarter i.e. Jan,Feb and March will be done on April month).


Once you have completed 6 months with the company you can take all saturday off which will be considered as leaves for 0.5 each day after approval from authorities.

 All the half days will be marked as part of leave and work without pay if increased by 2.5 leaves monthly.

 WFH will be issued by the company. No-one is allowed to take self WFH.
 All the WFH will be considered as a person's bad performance.This will be tracked down in his attendance.

 Unplanned Leaves will lead into project Miss-Management, angry Team Leads and bad appraisals.
 Everyone is advice to take planned leaves and not just ping on whats app or skype that you are not willing to come today because:
 1. You don't care about your work and want to enjoy taking leave on a working day.
 2. You want to consume all your planned or unplanned leave because you don't care about Bonus or appraisals.
 3. You are willing to risk the project you are working in and land on project less or internal projects forever

We will follow the following shifts:
 1st Shift > 10:00AM - 7:00 PM Interns
 2nd Shift > 10:30 AM - 7:30 PM Kubio
 3rd Shift > 1:00 PM - 10:00 PM SalesforceUp
 4th Shift > 3:00 PM - 12:00 AM Sales Shift.
 Team leads or Department Heads can request you to come and work in any shifts mentioned above.
 We have set office timing as Morning 8:00 AM to next day Morning 7:00 AM.
1. Sales Team must be working for a time period Shift > 3:00 PM - 12:00 AM Sales Shift. for 9 hrs mandatory.\n 2. Leaves causing a lost opportunity must be reviewed as bad performance.\n

Monday to Saturday are full working days for all Trainees, 9 hrs daily mandatory.

 No leaves are allowed during probation period. Leaves during the training period , will be considered as a indiscipline act and will be lead to strict actions.

 All Leaves will be Un- Paid leaves. 

 Attendance will be one of the major criteria for every Intern before giving a permanent offer.
